title: Lured to the Honeytrap: Episode 292
description:
The farmer in Cumbria was confused by the noise of the truck going past the house in the early hours so went outside to investigate. Looking in the river he saw something there and as he got closer he saw it was the body of a young man lying face down in the water.

And it was clear from his injuries that the young men had met a violent death....
